welcome_screen.text: Hi, we are Heka AI. We are here to support your health.

body_status_screen.title: What is your current body status?
body_status_screen.description: Choose the most suitable description for you

concern_screen.title: Do you have any concerns?
concern_screen.description: Choose the status you are facing

motivation_screen.title: Don't worry, be optimistic!
motivation_screen.description_1: There are many people who have taken control of calories to help their health and body become stronger and stronger.
motivation_screen.description_2: Heka AI was created to do this work extremely simply, and give Heka the next information to accompany you.

main_goal_screen.title: What is your main goal?
main_goal_screen.description: Choose the most important goal for you

age_screen.title: How old are you?
age_screen.description: This helps us calculate more accurately

gender_screen.title: What is your gender?
gender_screen.description: To calculate the appropriate calorie intake

height_weight_screen.title: Height and weight
height_weight_screen.description: Enter information to calculate BMI and plan
height_weight_screen.error_message: The data entered is not valid

underweight.quote: Low weight can affect the immune system and bone health. Focus on gaining weight in a healthy way.

normal.quote: Congratulations! You are maintaining an ideal body weight. Continue to live a healthy lifestyle to maintain this index.

overweight.quote: Overweight can increase the risk of chronic diseases. Reducing 5-10% of body weight will bring significant health benefits.

obesity.quote: Obesity is a major risk factor for many diseases. Consult your doctor for a safe and effective weight loss plan.

goal_weight.title: What is your goal weight?
goal_weight.not_valid: The data entered is not valid

activity_screen.title: What is your daily activity level?
activity_screen.description: Choose the level that suits your lifestyle

thankyou_screen.title: Thank you!
thankyou_screen.description_1: Thank you for providing the previous information. We have calculated the corresponding indicators for your body and will help you customize a plan that suits you.

diet_type_screen.title: Do you have any special diet?

challenge_screen.title: What is the biggest challenge for you?
challenge_screen.description: To help Heka AI support you best

water_intake_screen.title: How many glasses of water do you drink per day?
water_intake_screen.description: To track the necessary water intake

sleep_screen.title: How many hours do you sleep per day?

eating_out_screen.title: How many times do you eat out per week?
eating_out_screen.description: To create a personalized nutrition plan

previous_app_experience_screen.title: Have you ever used a calorie counter app before?

heka_feature_1_screen.title: Heka is extremely simple to use
heka_feature_1_screen.description: With Heka, you only need to take a photo or upload a food image, we will analyze the exact amount of nutrients in the food to 99% accuracy using AI technology.

heka_feature_2_screen.title: Detailed Macro & Nutrition analysis
heka_feature_2_screen.description: With AI technology and a large database, Heka can analyze Macro and Nutrition in the most detailed and accurate way.

heka_feature_3_screen.title: Smart connection
heka_feature_3_screen.description: Heka can help you track calories burned and intake more accurately through smart watch apps and smart watch apps.

medical_condition_screen.title: Do you have any special health conditions?
medical_condition_screen.description: To provide the best advice and safety

analtstic_text.analtstic_text_3: Heka will give you the amount of calories you need to control
analtstic_text.analtstic_text_4: Heka is ready for your personalized plan

timeline_screen.title: How long do you want to complete this plan?
timeline_screen.description: Choose the time that suits your goal

commitment_screen.title: Are you ready to commit?
commitment_screen.description: Commitment is the key to success

commitment.commitment_4: Not sure, but want to try

email_input_screen.title: Enter your email to active your personalized plan
email_input_screen.description: Your plan has been customized for you
email_input_screen.notice_text:
Note: Please enter your correct email to sync benefits with Heka AI on mobile.
We respect your privacy and commit to protecting your personal data. Your data will be processed according to our Privacy Policy.

recommendation.title: Heka AI recommendation
recommendation.description: To achieve your goal in the simplest and most effective way, we recommend you use the Premium package.

paywall_screen.title: Select the Premium package that suits you
paywall_screen.description: Unlock all AI features of Heka

CTA_btn.title: Select yearly package - Best deal
CTA_btn.click_btn: Click to select the most popular package

review_1.name: John Doe
review_1.review: Heka AI has changed the way I track nutrition. Just take a photo and get accurate results!

review_2.name: Jane Smith
review_2.review: I lost 15kg in 4 months thanks to Heka AI. The smartest and easiest app!

review_3.name: David Johnson
review_3.review: Deep macro analysis helps me understand nutrition better. Worth the money!

review_4.name: James Wilson
review_4.review: AI of Heka is accurate to 99%. I no longer have to guess about calories!

review_5.name: Anna Martinez
review_5.review: Beautiful interface, powerful features. Heka AI is the perfect nutrition assistant for me!

success_screen.title: Payment successful
success_screen.description: Congratulations! You have successfully registered for the Heka AI Premium package. Your personalized plan has been sent to your email.

loading_screen.step_3: Heka gives you the amount of calories you need to control
loading_screen.step_4: Heka is ready for your personalized plan
